cards.code:
Tableau Embed Demo

Have some business data you'd like to display from Tableau?

Tableau lets you embed visualizations.

Embed Views into Webpages - Tableau

Once you have the embed code, use an iframe to include it in a card.

<iframe
  src="EMBED_CODE"
  style="width: 100%; height: 100%; border: 0;">
</iframe>

Couple things to remember. Set a height on your card. Example using CSS: height: 400px;

You'll need to have at least one query to display cards. If you don't need to query any data, add a query and use a parse function to return some dummy data. For example: []
cards.name: card2
